Package us.daveread.edu.graphics.shape

Interface Drawable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Ellipse, Image, LineSegment, Pixel, Rectangle, Text, VisibleObject
    public interface Drawable
    Contract for a graphic than can be drawn on the DrawingSurface.
    Author:
    readda
    See Also:
    DrawingSurface, DrawingSurface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drawMe​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Method that draws the graphic using the provided graphics context.
      boolean isClickable()
      Detect whether the Drawable is clickable.
      boolean mouseClickDetected​(int x, int y)
      Check if the mouse click occurred on this drawable.
      void setDrawingSurface​(DrawingSurface myDrawingSurface)
      Set the drawing surface which contains this Drawable

    • Method Detail

      • drawMe

        void drawMe​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Method that draws the graphic using the provided graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context for drawing

      • setDrawingSurface

        void setDrawingSurface​(DrawingSurface myDrawingSurface)
        Set the drawing surface which contains this Drawable
        Parameters:
        myDrawingSurface - The drawing surface that this Drawable is on

      • mouseClickDetected

        boolean mouseClickDetected​(int x,
                           int y)
        Check if the mouse click occurred on this drawable.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the mouse click
        y - The Y coordinate of the mouse click
        Returns:
        True if the X, Y coordinate lies within the Drawable's area
        See Also:
        isClickable()

      • isClickable

        boolean isClickable()
        Detect whether the Drawable is clickable. If true the underlying implementation's logic for determining a click occurred will be used. Otherwise clicks on the Drawable will be ignored.
        Returns:
        True if clicking the Drawable is to be detected
        See Also:
        mouseClickDetected(int, int), DrawingSurface.drawableMouseClick(Drawable)
